/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and trucks, adding a dynamic element to the image. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in natural light, suggesting it was taken during the day.
